job_description.job_description: The Store Manager is responsible for assisting in driving positive results, leading by example, and supporting and adhering to all company initiatives and expectations. The Store Manager is responsible for overseeing all daily operations of a store while recruiting and developing employees to support the needs of the business. This position has full accountability for the store’s KPI performance, meeting goals, controlling financial results, shrink, talent selection, turnover and presentation.
required_qualifications: Minimum of 3-5 years’ experience as a specialty Retail Manager in relevant traffic, volume and unit intensity, or comparable management experience.
High School diploma or equivalent required; bachelor’s degree preferred.
Excellent customer engagement, talent development, visual presentation, and operational skills.
responsibilities: Overseeing all daily operations of a store.
Controlling financial results and store’s KPI performance.
Ensuring adherence to company initiatives and expectations.
